title: Kogel Shimano preload bolts add a hit of color to your cranks
content:
If that black plastic preload bolt is the last boring piece of hardware on your bike, the Kogel Shimano Crank Arm Fixing Bolt is the answer. Available in black, blue, silver, red, and gold, it replaces the stock part with an anodized 6061-T6 alloy part. They come in two lengths, Short (7mm) and Long (13mm)

The post Kogel Shimano preload bolts add a hit of color to your cranks appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
